GSD37vaikhd_u:2: Vaikh 01.01.(112.2-3)/ yasmād brāhmaṇo asya mukham \āsīd iti śrutiḥ.

GSD37vaikhd_u:11: Vaikh 01.01.(112.9-10)/ tad.āśramiṇaś catvāro brahmacārī gṛhasthovānaprastho bhikṣur iti.
GSD37vaikhd_u:13: tarpaṇaṃ brahmayajñaṃ sāyaṃ.prātaḥ sandhyā.upāsana.samidd.homau cakurvan guroḥ pādāv
GSD37vaikhd_u:15: Vaikh 01.02.(112.13-15) sthite gurau stheyād utthite pūrvam utthāyavrajantam \anugacched. āsīne śayāne ca niyukto nīcair anvāsana.śayane \kuryād.
GSD37vaikhd_u:24: Vaikh 01.02.(113.6-7) guru.abhāve tat.putre ca guruvat karma-\ācarati.
GSD37vaikhd_u:25: Vaikh 01.03.(113.8-9) brahmacāriṇaś caturvidhā gāyatro brāhmaḥprājāpatyo naiṣṭhika-iti.

GSD37vaikhd_u:28: gṛheṣu bhaikṣa.ācaraṇaṃ veda.vratacaraṇaṃ ca \kṛtvādvādaśa samā viṃśati samā vā guru.kule
GSD37vaikhd_u:29: \sthitvā vedān vedau vedaṃ vā sūtra.sahitamadhyayanaṃ \kṛtvā gārhasthya.anusaraṇaṃ \kuryāt.
GSD37vaikhd_u:30: Vaikh 01.03.(113.14-15)/ prājāpatyaḥ \snātvā nityakarma.brahmacarya.śīlo nārāyaṇa.parāyaṇo veda.vedāṅga.arthān \vicārya dāra.saṃgrahaṇaṃ \karoti.
GSD37vaikhd_u:31: Vaikh 01.03.(113.15-16)/ prājāpatye trisaṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ na \tiṣṭhedity ṛṣayo \vadanti.
GSD37vaikhd_u:32: Vaikh 01.03.(113.16-114.3) / naiṣṭhikaḥ kāṣāyaṃ dhātu.vastram ajinaṃvalkalaṃ vā paridhāya
GSD37vaikhd_u:33: jaṭī śikhī vā mekhalī daṇḍī sūtra.ajina.dhārībrahmacārī śucir a.kṣāra.lavaṇa.āśī
GSD37vaikhd_u:35: Vaikh 01.04.(114.4-7) / dārān saṃgṛhya gṛhastho-apisnānādi.niyama.ācāro nityam aupāsanaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:38: Vaikh 01.04.(114.7-10) / bhikṣūn brahmacāriṇo-atithīn vedavidaḥ śrotriyān pitṛvya.ācārya.ṛtvij.mātula.śvaśura.ādīn
GSD37vaikhd_u:40: Vaikh 01.04.(114.10)/ aśakto-apy-agraṃ bhikṣāṃ vā sa.udakaṃ dattvāśeṣaṃ \bhuñjīta).
GSD37vaikhd_u:42: devān śrāddhaiḥ putraiś ca pitṛṛnbalinā bhūtān annādyair manuṣyāṃś ca nityam \arcayed.
GSD37vaikhd_u:44: gṛhasthāś caturvidhā vārtā.vṛttiḥ śālīna.vṛttiryāyāvaro ghora.ācārikaś ca-iti.VKḥṅṣ.08.05.(114.14)/
GSD37vaikhd_u:46: śālīna.vṛttir niyamair yutaḥ pākayajñair\ṣṭvā-agnīn \adhāya pakṣe pakṣe darśapūrṇamāsa.yājī caturṣu caturṣu māseṣu
GSD37vaikhd_u:47: cāturmāsya.yājīṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣu paśubandha.yājī prati.saṃvatsaraṃ soma.yājī ca.VKḥḍṣ.01.05.(115.1-3)/
GSD37vaikhd_u:48: yāyāvaro haviryajñaiḥ somayajñaiś ca \yajate\yājayaty adhīte-\adhyāpayati dadāti

GSD37vaikhd_u:58: vana.āśramaṃ \yāsyann āhita.agnir anāhita.agniś ca-aupāsanam araṇyām\āropya gṛhe

GSD37vaikhd_u:62: tridhā.kṛtaṃ rajjuvat- mūle baddhaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśad aṅgula.pramāṇaṃparistaraṇa.kūrcaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:66: nirūpya śrāmanakāya svāhā śrāmaṇaka.yajñāya svāhāyajñadaivataviśvebhyo devebhyaḥ

GSD37vaikhd_u:73: vanastho nityam aupāsanavat sāyaṃ.prātar.āhutīr \hutvā mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ śrāmaṇaka.agniṃ \juhuyād).
GSD37vaikhd_u:74: Vaikh 01.06.(116.5)/ patnīko dārair agnibhir vinā vanaṃ \gacchet).
GSD37vaikhd_u:77: Vaikh 01.07.(116.7)/ audumbaro vairiñco vālakhilyaḥ phenapaś ca-iti.
GSD37vaikhd_u:83: Vaikh 01.07.(116.12-15) / vairiñcaḥ prātryāṃ diśaṃ \prekṣate tāṃ diśaṃ\gatvā tatra
GSD37vaikhd_u:86: Vaikh 01.07.(116.15-17) vālakhilyo jaṭā.dharaścīra.valkala.vasano-arka.agniḥ kārttikyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ puṣkalaṃ bhuktam \utsṛjya-anyathā śeṣān māsān upajīvyatapaḥ \kuryāt).

GSD37vaikhd_u:95: dhūma.aśinaḥpāṣāṇa.śāyino-abhyavagāhina udakumbha.vāsino mauninaś ca-avāk.śirasaḥ sūrya.pratimukhā ūrdhva.bāhukā eka.pāda.sthitāś ca-iti vividha.ācārā
GSD37vaikhd_u:97: Vaikh 01.09.(117.12-13)/ atha bhikṣukā mokṣa.arthinaḥ kuṭīcakābahu.udakā haṃsāḥ paramahaṃsāś ca-iti caturvidhā \bhavanti).
GSD37vaikhd_u:98: Vaikh 01.09.(117.13-15)tatra kuṭīcakā gautama.bhāradvāja.yājñavalkya.hārīta.prabhṛtīnām āśrameṣv aṣṭau grāsāṃṣ caranto yogamārga.tattvajñā mokṣam
GSD37vaikhd_u:102: Vaikh 01.09.(118.1-4) / haṃsā nāma grāme ca-ekarātraṃ nagarepañcarātraṃ vasantas
GSD37vaikhd_u:103: tad.upari na vasanto gomūtra.gomaya.āhāriṇo vā māsa.upvāsino vānitya.cāndrāyaṇa.vratino
GSD37vaikhd_u:105: Vaikh 01.09.(118.4-5) paramahaṃsā nāma vṛkṣa.ekamūle śūnya.agāreśmaśāne ā vāsinaḥ sa.ambarā dig.ambarā vā.
GSD37vaikhd_u:106: Vaikh 01.09.(118.5-6)/ na teṣāṃ dharma.adharmau satya.anṛteśuddhi.aśuddhi.ādi dvaitaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:108: Vaikh 01.09.(118.7-8)/ brāhmaṇānāṃ cāturāśramyaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃtraya.āśramyaṃ vaiśyānāṃ dvi.āśramyaṃ vihitaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:109: Vaikh 01.09.(118.8-9)/ tat.phalaṃ hi sa.kāmaṃ niṣ.kāmaṃ ca-iti dvividhaṃ\bhavati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:110: Vaikh 01.09.(118.9-11) sa.kāmaṃ nāma-iha saṃsāre-abhivṛddhiṃ \jñātvā putra.lābha.ādi.abhikāṅkṣaṇam anyat svarga.ādi.phala.kāṅkṣaṇaṃ vā.
GSD37vaikhd_u:111: Vaikh 01.09.(118.11-12)/ niṣ.kāmaṃ nāma kiñcid \an.abhikāṅkṣya yathāvihita.anuṣṭhānam iti.
GSD37vaikhd_u:112: Vaikh 01.09.(118.12-13)/ tatra niṣ.kāmam dvividhaṃ bhavati pravṛttirnivṛttiś ca-iti.
GSD37vaikhd_u:113: Vaikh 01.09.(118.13-15)/ pravṛttir nāma saṃsāram \an.ādṛtyasaṅkhya.jñānaṃ \samāśritya prāṇāyāma.āsana.pratyāhāra.dhāraṇā.yukto vāyu.jayaṃ \kṛtvā-aṇima.ādy.aiśvarya.prāpaṇaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:114: Vaikh 01.09.(118.15-119.1) tat punar api tapaḥ.kṣayāj janma.prāpakatvādvyādhi.bāhulyāc ca na-\ādriyante)
GSD37vaikhd_u:116: Vaikh 01.09.(119.1-6) / nivṛttir nāma lokānām anityatvaṃ \jñātvā paramātmano-anyan
GSD37vaikhd_u:117: na kiñcid asti-iti saṃsāram \anādṛtya \cchitvā bhāryā.mayaṃ pāśaṃjita.indriyo \bhūtvā
GSD37vaikhd_u:119: nitya.ānandam amṛta.rasa.pānavat sarvadā tṛpt.karaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥpraveśakam iti \vijñāyate).
GSD37vaikhd_u:122: Vaikh 01.10.(119.8-9)/ a.nirodhakā nirodhakā mārga.gā vimārga.gāśca-iti caturvidhā sāraṅgā.
GSD37vaikhd_u:123: Vaikh 01.10.(119.9-10)/ dūra.gā adūra.gā bhrūmadhya.gā a.saṃbhaktāḥsaṃbhaktāś ca-ity eka.arthyāḥ pañcadhā \bhavanti).
GSD37vaikhd_u:125: Vaikh 01.10.(119.11-13)/ tatra sāraṅgāḥ sāraṃ kṣetrajñas taṃ\gacchanti)
GSD37vaikhd_u:126: -iti sāraṅgās teṣv a.nirodhakā ahaṃ viṣṇur iti \dhyātvā ye \caranti)
GSD37vaikhd_u:128: Vaikh 01.10.(119.13-14)/ ye tu nirodhakās teṣāṃ prāṇāyāma.pratyāhāra.dhāraṇā.ādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ \santi).
GSD37vaikhd_u:129: Vaikh 01.10.(119.14-15)/ ye mārga.gās teṣāṃ ṣaḍ eva prāṇāyāma.ādayo.
GSD37vaikhd_u:130: Vaikh 01.10.(119.15-17) ye vimārgās teṣāṃ yama.niyama.āsana.prāṇāyāma.pratyāhāra.dhāraṇā.dhyāna.samādhayaśca-ity aṣṭa.aṅgān \kalpayanto dhyeyam apy anyathā \kurvanti).
GSD37vaikhd_u:132: Vaikh 01.11.(120.1)/ eka eva-ṛṣir yeṣāṃ te ekārṣyās.
GSD37vaikhd_u:133: Vaikh 01.11.(120.1-2)/ teṣu ye dūra.gās teṣām ayaṃ mārgaḥ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:135: puruṣeṇa \saṃyujya tataś candra.maṇḍalaṃ tatra.sthena puruṣeṇa tatovidyutaṃ tatra.sthena
GSD37vaikhd_u:138: Vaikh 01.11.(120.5-7) kṣetrajña.paramātmanor yogaṃ kṣetrajña.dvāreṇa\kārayitvā tatra-eva samasta.vināśaṃ dhyātvā-ākāśavat sattā.mātro-aham iti
GSD37vaikhd_u:147: Vaikh 01.11.(120.13-14)/ saṃbhaktā nāma brāhmaṇaḥ sarva.vyāpakatvādyuktam ayuktaṃ yo-asau paramātmā tat sa vyāpya-ākāśavat \tiṣṭhati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:148: Vaikh 01.11.(120.15) tasmād brahmaṇo-anyan na kutracid ātmānaṃ\pratipadyate)-asau.
GSD37vaikhd_u:155: Vaikh 01.11.(121.4) visaraga.paśūnām ahaṃkāra.yuktānāṃ janma.antareṣumuktir na-asmiñ janmani.
GSD37vaikhd_u:157: Vaikh 01.11.(121.5-8) / kecid visargāḥ kāya.kleśāt kecin mantra.japātkecid yena kenacid
GSD37vaikhd_u:158: dhyānena kecid yena kenacid akṣareṇa kecid vāyu.jayād anye paramātmanākṣetrajaṃ saṃyojya \dhyāyanty)
GSD37vaikhd_u:161: Vaikh 01.11.(121.9-10)/ kecin na kiñcid dhyānam itiyathā.ukta.anuṣṭhānaṃ yogam iti jñātvā muktim \icchanti).
GSD37vaikhd_u:162: Vaikh 01.11.(121.10-11)/ teṣāṃ visaraga.paśūnāṃantareṣu muktir na-asmiñ janmani.
GSD37vaikhd_u:163: Vaikh 01.11.(121.11-12)/ tasminn eva janmani mokṣa.kāṅkṣiṇāvisaraga.pakṣo na-anuṣṭheyaḥ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:164: Vaikh 01.11.(121.12-15)/ sa.guṇe brahmaṇi buddhiṃ niveśyapaścāt-nir.guṇaṃ brahma-āśritya yatnaṃ kuryād iti \vijñāyate).
GSD37vaikhd_u:166: Vaikh 02.01.(122.1-3)/ gṛhasthaḥ somayājī putraṃ pautraṃ ca dṛṣṭvātat.putra.ādīn gṛhe saṃsthāpya mauṇḍyaṃ kṛtvā prājāpatyaṃ kṛcchraṃ \caret).
GSD37vaikhd_u:167: Vaikh 02.01.(122.3-4) vasante śukla.pakṣe puṇya.kṣetre patnyā sārdhaṃvana.āśramaṃ \yāti).
GSD37vaikhd_u:168: Vaikh 02.01.(122.4-5)/ pūrvasmin divase kṛta.snānaḥ saṃkalpyakuśa.udakaṃ pītvā-upavāsaṃ \kuryād).
GSD37vaikhd_u:169: Vaikh 02.01.(122.5-6) aupāsana.homaṃ hutvā-agni.mayaṃ te yonir ityaraṇyām \āropayed).

GSD37vaikhd_u:174: Vaikh 02.01.(122.10-13) / praṇamya-agniṃ pariṣicya-agne prāyaścitte tvam iti pañca.prāyaścittaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:177: Vaikh 02.02(122.14-17)/ agneḥ pratīcyāṃ dvau kuśau pūrva.agraunyasya-ūrdhve-aśmānaṃ nidhāya tat savitur vareṇyam iti dakṣiṇapāda.aṅguṣṭhāgreṇa-aśmānam\adhitiṣṭhet)
GSD37vaikhd_u:178: tejo.vatsava iti\on the reading of the mantra, cf. Cal p.122n.4)
GSD37vaikhd_u:179: valkalam ajinaṃ cīraṃvā paridhāya pūrvavan mekhalā.ādīṃs trīṇy upavītāny uttarīyaṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca-\ādadāty).
GSD37vaikhd_u:180: Vaikh 02.02(122.17-123.1) ācamya svasti deva-iti- agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃpraṇāmaṃ ca kṛtvā-\āsīta).
GSD37vaikhd_u:181: Vaikh 02.02(123.1-3)/ śaṃ no vedīr iti sva.mūrdhni prokṣya jayānabhyātānān rāṣṭrabhṛto vyāhṛtīś ca hutvā-ājya.śeṣaṃ prāṇāyāmena \prāśnīyād)
GSD37vaikhd_u:182: Vaikh 02.02(123.3-5)/ yoge yoga iti dvir ācamya śatam in nu śarada-itipraṇāmam āgantrā samagan mahi-iti pradakṣiṇaṃ ca-ādityasya \kurvīta).
GSD37vaikhd_u:184: Vaikh 02.02(123.6-10) / oṃ bhūs tat savitur oṃ bhuvo bhargo devasyoṃsuvardhiyo yo
GSD37vaikhd_u:185: na iti paccho vyastām oṃ bhūr bhuvas tat savitur oṃ suvardhiyo yo na ity ardharcām
GSD37vaikhd_u:186: oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ suvas tat savitur iti samastāṃ casāvitrīṃ japtvā vanāśramaṃ praviśya
GSD37vaikhd_u:189: Vaikh 02.03(123.11-14) svayam eva-agniṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya-ājyena prājāpatyaṃ dhātā.ādīn
GSD37vaikhd_u:190: minda.āhutī vicchinnam aindraṃ vaiśvadevaṃ vaiśṇavaṃ bāhyaṃ viṣṇornuka.ādīn prājāpatya.sūktaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:192: Vaikh 02.03(123.14-16)/ sthitvā devasya tvā yo me daṇḍa iti dvābhyāṃ pañca.sapta.nava.anyatamaiḥ parvabhir yuktaṃ keśānta.āyataṃvā-apy-avakraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ dvi.daṇḍam \ādadāti).
GSD37vaikhd_u:193: Vaikh 02.03(123.16-17)/ yena devā iti kamaṇḍalu.mṛd.grahiṇyau pūrvavadupānaṭ.chatre ca \gṛhṇāty).
GSD37vaikhd_u:195: prājāpatyaṃ viṣṇu.sūktaṃ ca sarvatra-agnaye svāhā somāya viṣṇavesvāhā-iti hutvā-agnīn
GSD37vaikhd_u:197: Vaikh 02.03(123.20-124.1) vane-adrau vivikte nadī.tīre vanāśramaṃpraklpya yathā.uktam agnikuṇḍāni \kuryāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:199: agnyāyatane prokṣya khanitvā lekhāḥ ṣaḍ ullikhyasuvarṇa.śakalaṃ vrīhīṃś ca nidhāya śrāmaṇaka.agniṃ \nidadhyāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:200: Vaikh 02.04(124.4-7) vanyān eva pārthivān vānaspatyānkulīra.udghāta.añchaṇān purāṇān
GSD37vaikhd_u:201: kuśa.darbhān ūrṇā.stukāṃ plakṣa.agraṃ sugandhi.tejanaṃ gugguluṃ hiraṇya.śakalān sūrya.kāntaṃ ca \saṃbharati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:202: Vaikh 02.04(124.7-9) / vānaprasthān ṛtvijo vṛtvā-agniṃ mathitvāgārhapatya.ādīṃs tretā.agnīn
GSD37vaikhd_u:203: pañca.agnīn vā-agnyādheya.krameṇa-ādhāya-āhutī dve dvehutvā nityaṃ dvi.kālaṃ vanyair eva \juhoti).
GSD37vaikhd_u:208: na-utsṛjan grāmya.aśanaṃ tyaktvā vanya.oṣadhīḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃśākaṃ vā nitya.aśanaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:209: saṃkalpya tirodhā bhūr ity-āhṛtya- aparāhṇe svayaṃ patnīvā haviṣyam āsrāvitaṃ \pacati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:212: Vaikh 02.05.(125.1-2)/ adhastād darbhāṃs tṛṇāni parṇāni vā-āstīryasu.vrataḥ su.vratāṃ patnīṃ vinā-ekaḥ \śayīta).
GSD37vaikhd_u:216: Vaikh 02.05.(125.4-5)/ darśapūrṇamāsau cāturmāsyaṃ nakṣatra.iṣṭimāgrayaṇa.iṣṭiṃ ca vanya.oṣadhībhiḥ pūrvavad \yajed) anukramān.
GSD37vaikhd_u:217: Vaikh 02.05.(125.5-7) / mūlaiḥ phalaiḥ pattraiḥ puṣpair vātat.tat.kālena pakvaiḥ
GSD37vaikhd_u:218: svayam eva saṃśīrṇaiḥ prāṇaṃ pravartayann uttara.uttare-apy adhikaṃ tapaḥ.saṃyogaṃphalādi.viśiṣtam \ācared).
GSD37vaikhd_u:219: Vaikh 02.05.(125.7-10) / atha vā-āhitāgniḥ sarvān agnīn araṇyāmāropya sarvaiḥ saṃvāpa.mantraiḥ

GSD37vaikhd_u:435: Vaikh 03.06.(137.14)/ bhūmau vīkṣya jantūn pariharan pādaṃ \nyased).
GSD37vaikhd_u:440: Vaikh 03.07.(137.18)/ bhikṣā.kālād anyatra para.veśma na gantavyaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:443: u tyam ity-ādityāya-ato devā iti viṣṇave brahma jajñām iti brahmaṇe ca bhikṣā.agraṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:445: Vaikh 03.07.(138.3-4)/ pāṇinā-agnihotra.vidhānena-ātmayajñaṃ saṃkalpya prāṇayātrā.mātram aṣṭau grāsān vā-\aśnīyāt)
GSD37vaikhd_u:451: Vaikh 03.07.(138.6-8) saṅgaṃ tyaktvā niyama.yamī priyaṃ satyaṃ vadansarvabhūtasya-avirodhī samaḥ sadā-adhyātma.rato dhyāna.yogī nārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ brahmapaśyan dhāraṇāṃ \dhārayed).
GSD37vaikhd_u:454: Vaikh 03.08.(138.10-13) / saṃnyāsino-an.āhitāgner dehaṃ mṛtaṃ putro-anyovā tṛṇair
GSD37vaikhd_u:455: antarīkṛtya śuddhair brāhmaṇair yantreṇa vā saṃnidhāya samudra.gāmyāṃnadyāṃ tīre
GSD37vaikhd_u:456: vā saikate deśe sṛgāla.ādibhir aspṛśyaṃ yathā tathā-avaṭaṃ \khanati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:457: Vaikh 03.08.(138.13-139.1) / gāyatryā snāpayitvā tathātatra-āsayitvā śāyayitvā vā
GSD37vaikhd_u:458: dakṣiṇe haste vaiṣṇavair mantrais tri.daṇḍaṃ saṃnyasya savye yad asya pārerajasa
GSD37vaikhd_u:459: iti śikyam ap.pavitram udare sāvitryā bhikṣā.pātraṃ guhyapradeśe bhūmir bhūmimiti
GSD37vaikhd_u:461: Vaikh 03.08.(139.1-2) tasmin sṛgāla.ādibhiḥ spṛṣṭe tat.kartā pāpīyān\bhavati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:462: Vaikh 03.08.(139.2-6)/ āhitāgner agnīn ātmany āropya saṃnyasino mṛtaṃdehaṃ gāyatryā snāpayitvā pūrvavad vāhayitvā śuddhe deśe nidhāya laukika.agnau tadagnim \upāvaroha)
GSD37vaikhd_u:463: -ity avaropya pavitraṃ ta-iti ghṛta.kṣīram āsye prakṣipya pūrvavattri.daṇḍa.ādīn vinyasya brahmamedhena pitṛmedhena vā-āhitāgni.mantrais tad.agnibhir
GSD37vaikhd_u:466: Vaikh 03.08.(139.8-9)/ tad.vahanaṃ khanitvā pidhānaṃ dahanaṃnārāyaṇa.baliṃ vā yaḥ \kuryāt)/
GSD37vaikhd_u:468: Vaikh 03.09.(139.10-14) nārāyaṇa.baliṃ nārāyaṇād evasarvārtha.siddhir iti brahmaṇa.ādyair
GSD37vaikhd_u:470: anyeṣāṃ bhikṣoś ca-ekādaśa.dinād ūrdhvaṃ mahāpātakināṃ pañcānāṃ dvādaśa.saṃvatsarād
GSD37vaikhd_u:471: ūrdhvaṃsapiṇḍīkaraṇa.sthāne mṛtaka.artham aparapakṣe dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇe vā
GSD37vaikhd_u:474: Vaikh 03.09.(139.15-16)/ apare-ahani viṣṇor ālaya.pārśve nadī.tīregṛhe vā-agni.āyatanaṃ kṛtvā-āghāraṃ \juhuyād).
GSD37vaikhd_u:475: Vaikh 03.09.(139.16-150.2) / agniṃ paristīrya-agner vāyavyāṃ viṣṭaredarbheṣu tad.rūpaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:476: suvarṇaṃ vā saṃsthāpya puruṣaṃ dhyāyann oṃ bhūḥ puruṣam ity -ādyaiḥprāṅ.mukhaṃ devaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:482: Vaikh 03.10.(140.5-6)/ pariṣicya sahasraśīrṣa.ādyair viṣṇor nuka.ādyairdvādaśa.nāmabhiś ca-ājyaṃ caruṃ \juhuyāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:483: Vaikh 03.10.(140.7-8)/ guḍa.ājya.phala.yuktaṃ pāyasaṃ havirviṣṇu.gāyatryā deva.īśāya nivedya pādya.ācamana.mukha.vāsaṃ \dadyāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:485: nārāyaṇāya sahasraśīrṣāya sahasrākṣāya sahasrapādāyaparamapuruṣāya paramātmane paraṃjyotiṣe
GSD37vaikhd_u:486: parabrahmaṇe- avyaktāya sarvakāraṇāya yajña.īśvarāyayajñātmane viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ
GSD37vaikhd_u:487: sarvābhyo devatābhyaḥ sādhyebhya-ity antaiḥ pāyasaṃ baliṃ\dattvā)
GSD37vaikhd_u:490: dattvā puṣpa.ādyaiḥ pūjayitvā dvādaśa.mūrtiṃ dhyāyann upadaṃśa.ghṛta.guḍa.dadhi.phala.yuktaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:494: Vaikh 03.10.(141.1-2)/ abhīṣṭāṃ parāṃ gatiṃ sa gatvā viṣṇor loke\mahīyate).
GSD37vaikhd_u:495: Vaikh 03.11.(141.3-4)/ cāturvarṇya.saṃkareṇa-utpannānām anuloma.pratiloma.antarāla.vrātyānām utpattiṃ nāma vṛttiṃ ca.-
GSD37vaikhd_u:500: Vaikh 03.11.(141.7-8)/ brahmaṇo mukhād udbhūtā brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇyaś ca brahma.ṛṣayaḥ patnyo \babhūvus).
GSD37vaikhd_u:501: Vaikh 03.11.(141.8-9)/ teṣāṃ gātra.utpannād brāhmaṇyāṃ a.sagotrāyāṃvidhinā sa.mantrakaṃ gṛhītāyāṃ jāto brāhmaṇaḥ śuddho \bhavet).
GSD37vaikhd_u:502: Vaikh 03.11.(141.10-11) vidhi.hīnam anya.pūrvāyāṃ golakohartṛkāyāṃ kuṇḍaś ca viprau dvau ninditau \syātāṃ ).
GSD37vaikhd_u:503: Vaikh 03.11.(141.11-12)/ tasmād adho bāhubhyāmāt kṣatriyāt kṣatriyāyāṃ vidhivat-jātaḥ kṣatriyaḥ śuddhas.
GSD37vaikhd_u:508: Vaikh 03.11.(141.15-142.1)/ adhastād ūrubhyāmād vaiśyād vaiśyāyāṃ tathā vaiśyaḥ śuddho.
GSD37vaikhd_u:510: Vaikh 03.12.(142.3)/ atha padbhyām utpannāt-śūdrāt-śudrāyāṃ nyāyenaśūdraḥ śuddhaḥ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:514: Vaikh 03.12.(142.6-7)/ brāhmaṇāt kṣatriya.kanyāyāṃ jātaḥ savarṇo-anulomeṣu mukhyo.
GSD37vaikhd_u:515: Vaikh 03.12.(142.7-8) asya vṛttir ātharvaṇaṃkarma.aśva.hasti.ratha.saṃvāhanam ārohaṇaṃ rajñaḥ saināpatyaṃ ca-āyurveda.kṛtyaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:517: Vaikh 03.12.(142.9)/ abhiṣiktaś cet-nṛpo bhūyād aṣṭāṅgam āyurvedaṃbhūta.tantraṃ vā \saṃpaṭet).
GSD37vaikhd_u:520: Vaikh 03.12.(142.11-12)/ viprād vaiśyāyām ambaṣṭhaḥkakṣyājīvya.āgneyanartako dhvajaviśrāvī śalya.cikitsī.
GSD37vaikhd_u:521: Vaikh 03.12.(142.13)/ jarāt kumbhakāraḥ kulāla.vṛttir na-āpito nābherūrdhva.vaptā ca.
GSD37vaikhd_u:522: Vaikh 03.12.(142.14-15)/ kṣatriyād vaiśyāyāṃ madguḥ śreṣṭhitvaṃ prāpto mahānarma.ākhyaś ca vaiśya.vṛttiḥ kṣātram karma na-\ācarati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:530: Vaikh 03.13.(143.6-7)/ tato-anulomād anulomāyāṃ jātaś ca-anulomaḥpitur mātur vā jātaṃ vṛttiṃ \bhajeta).
GSD37vaikhd_u:531: Vaikh 03.13.(143.7-9)/ kṣatriyād viprakanyāyāṃ mantravat- jātaḥ sūtaḥpratilomeṣu mukhyo-ayaṃ mantrahīna.upanīto dvijadharma.hīno.
GSD37vaikhd_u:532: Vaikh 03.13.(143.9)/ asya vṛttir dharma.anubodhanaṃ rājño-anna.saṃskāraś ca.
GSD37vaikhd_u:533: Vaikh 03.13.(143.10-11)/ jāreṇa mantrahīna.jo rathakārodvijatva.vihīnaḥ śūdra.kṛtyo- aśvānāṃ poṣaṇa.damanādi.paricaryā.jīvī.
GSD37vaikhd_u:534: Vaikh 03.13.(143.11-13)/ vaiśyād brāhmaṇyāṃ māgadhaḥ. śūdrair apyabhojyān no- aspṛśyaḥ sarvavandī praśaṃsā.kīrtana.gāna.preṣaṇa.vṛttir.
GSD37vaikhd_u:536: Vaikh 03.14.(143.14-15)/ vaiśyān nṛpāyām āyogavas tantu.vāyaḥ paṭa.kartā vastra.kāṃsya.uapjīvī.
GSD37vaikhd_u:538: Vaikh 03.14.(143.16-17)/ śūdrāt kṣatriyāyāṃ pulkasaḥ kṛtakāṃ vāārkṣāṃ vā surāṃ \hutvā)
GSD37vaikhd_u:541: Vaikh 03.14.(144.1-2)/ śūdrād vaiśyāyāṃ vaidehakaḥ śūdra.aspṛśyastair apy abhojya.anno vanya.vṛttir aja.mahiṣa.gopālas tad.rasān vikrayī.
GSD37vaikhd_u:544: kakṣerī.yukto yatas tataś caran sarvakarma.bahiṣkṛtaḥ pūrvāhṇe grāma.ādau vīthyām
GSD37vaikhd_u:547: Vaikh 03.14.(144.6-7)/ madhyāhnāt paraṃ grāme na \viśaty)/ ayaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:551: Vaikh 03.14.(144.8-10)/ cūcukād viprāyāṃ takṣako-aspṛśyojhallarī.hasto dārukāraḥ suvarṇakāro-ayaskāraḥ kāṃsyakāro vā.
GSD37vaikhd_u:554: Vaikh 03.15.(144.12-13)/ ambaṣṭhād viprāyāṃ nāvikaḥsamudrapaṇya.matsya.jīvī samudra.laṅghanāṃ nāvaṃ \plāvayati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:555: Vaikh 03.15.(144.13-14)/ kṣatriyāyām adhonāpito nābher adho roma.vaptā.
GSD37vaikhd_u:562: Vaikh 03.15.(144.17-18) khananān nṛpāyām udbandhakaḥ śūdra.aspṛśyo vastra.nirṇejakaḥ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:564: Vaikh 03.15.(144.19-145.2)/ caṇḍālād viprāyāṃ śvapacaḥ caṇḍālavaccihna.yukto nitya.nindyaḥ sarvakarma.bahiṣkāryo nagaryādau mala.apohakaḥ śmaśāne
GSD37vaikhd_u:566: Vaikh 03.15.(145.3-4)/ vadhyān hatvā tad.vastrādi.grāhīparādhīna.āhāro bhinnapātra.bhojī śvamāṃsa.bhakṣī carma.vāra.vāṇa.vāṇijya.kārī \syāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:567: Vaikh 03.15.(145.4-5)/ tasmān nikṛṣṭe sute samutpanne patito naṣṭoghorān narakān \vrajati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:570: Vaikh 03.15.(145.6-8)/ tasmād brāhmaṇādyāḥ savarṇāyāṃ vidhivat putram \utpādayeyur)
